items.name: Black Lager
items.desc:
6 cans of Black Lager.
A 4.9% offering that still delivers big on refreshment while offering a little extra roasty depth and complexity. ⁣
⁣
There's a touch of Cascade in the whirlpool to keep you on your toes, but this beer is a lager at heart with a hint of stout about it.⁣
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.

items.name: Blended Blur Pale Ale
items.desc:
6 cans of Blended Blur Pale Ale.
We’ve been loving the latest batches of Loral we’ve managed to get our hands on, so it makes sense to go all in with our latest 4.8% pale!
It’s got a big floral nose backed up by reviving flavours of tangy orange and a hint of bitterness.
Possible delivery delays of up to 7 working days - 24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.

items.name: German Pilsner
items.desc:
6 cans of German Pilsner.
A simple, dry, clean and clear refresher made with 100% German Pilsen malt and heaps of Hallertau Mittlefrüh hops.
24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.

items.name: Keep Left DIPA
items.desc:
6 cans of Keep Left DIPA.
An 8% DIPA packed with the heady hop combo of Azacca, Galaxy, Motueka & Nelson Sauvin.

items.name: Reading Colour IPA
items.desc:
6 cans of Reading Colour IPA.
A 6.9% IPA brewed alongside Barth Haas that tests out a brand new dry hopping product (it ain't Incognito) and brings new aromatics and flavour notes to those superstars Mosaic & Citra.
Possible delivery delays of up to 7 working days - 24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.

items.name: Unconventional Tactics DIPA
items.desc:
6 cans of Unconventional Tactics DIPA.
It’s no secret that Nelson Sauvin is our favourite hop. No secret at all. To this end…here is the most "Nelsony" beer we’ve ever attempted. We’ve added Nelson on top of Nelson, squeezed a bit more Nelson in, and then finished it off with some Nelson. Super smooth. Super light. Super Nelson. ⁣
Possible delivery delays of up to 7 working days - 24hr delivery service from your beers leaving the brewery, not from placing your order. Please ensure your delivery details are correct at checkout.
Orders placed after 2PM Thur will be dispatched the following week.
